link_mentions.page: List of Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls
response: |1986||George AdrainGrant Knox||Bill BoettgerRonnie Jones||Chris WardDavid Ward

He won a bronze medal in the pairs with his younger brother David Ward at the 1986 Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh. He had earlier represented England in the pairs, at the 1978 Commonwealth Games in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada.
Her brothers Chris Ward and David Ward were both international players.
